protocol.text: All plants were grown under 16-h-light (22°C)/8-h-dark (20°C) cycles, either grown on soil or on plates with MS media containing 1.5% sucrose and 0.8% agar with appropriate selection markers. All seeds were vernalized at 4oC for 3 days before placement in a growth environment.

text: Labelling, hybridization, and detection were performed at the McGill University and Genome Quebec Innovation Centre (

protocol.text: Total RNA was isolated in three biological replicates from leaves of two-week-old wild type (ProβCG:GUS) and mutant (essp3/brm-6) seedlings grown on MS agar plates (1.5% sucrose) using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (QIAGEN).
